xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Assassinate the target and complete the mission.
  • Do it all in your suit.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Complete "Death in the Family."
  • Assassinate your targets with a sniper rifle.
  • Only eliminate the targets.
  • Do not get spotted.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU:
• Complete "Death in the Family".
  • Only kill the target.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
  • Do it all in your suit.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Complete "Death in the Family".
  • Only kill the target.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BIG4_DESC:
Complete all the Classic challenges on "Death in the Family".
  • Silent Assassin
  • Silent Assassin, Suit Only
  • Sniper Assassin
  • Suit Only
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_PHOTO_DESC: • Take a picture of Alexa Carlisle when she mourns her Brother.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTO_COWORKER_DES: Take a picture of the flirting couple
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PR: • Eliminate Alexa when she is in her private room.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PH: • Eliminate Alexa with electrocution during the photoshoot
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ROOF_SNIPER_: • Eliminate Alexa with a sniper Rifle from the roof of the mansion.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BUTLER_DID_IT_DESC: Convince Alexa the butler did it
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_UNDERTAKER_PRESENT: • Have the Undertaker display the grave for Alexa.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTOGRAPHER_FAMIL: • Have the family photographer take a picture of the Carlile family.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FAMILY_GATHERING_N: No Family  is ever what it seems from the outside.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MURDER_CLUES_DESC: • Find all the clues in the Locations of Interest to the Murder Mystery.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_GREGORY_NEWS_NAME: I hate to get news second hand
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_EDWARD_PIANO_DESC: • Pacify Edward when he is playing Piano.

en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Assassinate the target and complete the mission.
  • Do it all in your suit.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Complete "Death In The Family."
  • Assassinate the target with a sniper rifle.
  • Only eliminate the target.
  • Do not get spotted.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU:
• Complete "Death In The Family."
  • Only kill the target.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
  • Do it all in your suit.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Complete "Death In The Family."
  • Only kill the target.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BIG4_DESC:
Complete all the Classic challenges for "Death In The Family."
  • Silent Assassin
  • Silent Assassin, Suit Only
  • Sniper Assassin
  • Suit Only
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PR: • Eliminate Alexa Carlisle in her private room.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PH: • Electrocute Alexa Carlisle during the photo shoot.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ROOF_SNIPER_: • Eliminate Alexa Carlisle with a sniper rifle from the roof of the mansion.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_UNDERTAKER_PRESENT: • Have the undertaker present the grave for Alexa Carlisle.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTOGRAPHER_FAMIL: • Have the photographer take a photo of the Carlisle family.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FAMILY_GATHERING_D: • Take a photo of Alexa Carlisle during the family meeting.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_MURDE: Mission Story - Means, Motive And Opportunity
• Complete the mission story "Means, Motive And Opportunity."
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_PHOTO: Mission Story - A Day To Remember
• Complete the mission story "A Day To Remember."
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_BURIA: Mission Story - Her Final Resting Place
• Complete the mission story "Her Final Resting Place."
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_RING_BELL_DESC: • Make Alexa Carlisle upset about the Bell.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MURDER_CLUES_DESC: • Find all clues in each location of interest in the Murder Mystery.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PATRICK_POOL_DESC: • Pacify Patrick Carlisle with a pool ball.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_EDWARD_PIANO_DESC: • Pacify Edward Carlisle while he is playing piano.

fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Assassinez la cible et terminez la mission.
  • Ne vous déguisez pas.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Terminez "Mort dans la famille".
  • Éliminez vos cibles au fusil de précision.
  • Éliminez uniquement la cible.
  • Ne vous faites pas repérer.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU:
• Terminez "Mort dans la famille".
  • N'éliminez que vos cibles.
  • Aucun corps trouvé.
  • Ne vous faites pas repérer.
  • Si vous êtes repéré par les caméras, effacez ou détruisez la vidéo.
  • Ne vous déguisez pas.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Terminez "Mort dans la famille".
  • Abattez uniquement la cible.
  • Aucun corps trouvé.
  • Ne vous faites pas repérer.
  • Si vous êtes repéré par les caméras, effacez ou détruisez la vidéo.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BIG4_DESC:
Terminez tous les défis Classiques de "Mort dans la famille".
  • Assassin silencieux
  • Assassin silencieux, en costume
  • Assassin précis
  • En costume
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTO_COWORKER_DES: • Prenez une photo d'employés en train de flirter.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FIND_TOKENS_DESC: • Obtenez les deux jetons de la banque Milton-Fitzpatrick.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PR: • Éliminez Alexa Carlisle dans son salon privé.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_GR: • Offrez le repos éternel à Alexa Carlisle.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PH: • Électrocutez Alexa Carlisle pendant la séance photo.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_EM: Une autre mort dans la famille
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ROOF_SNIPER_: • Éliminez Alexa Carlisle avec un fusil de précision depuis le toit du manoir.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_UNDERTAKER_PRESENT: • Faites en sorte que le croque-mort présente sa tombe à Alexa Carlisle.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTOGRAPHER_FAMIL: • Faites en sorte que le photographe prenne la famille Carlisle en photo.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FAMILY_GATHERING_D: • Prenez une photo d'Alexa Carlisle pendant la réunion de famille.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MURDER_CLUES_DESC: • Trouvez tous les indices de chaque lieu d'intérêt dans l'affaire du meurtre.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PATRICK_POOL_DESC: • Neutralisez Patrick Carlisle avec une boule de billard.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_EDWARD_PIANO_DESC: • Neutralisez Edward Carlisle pendant qu'il joue du piano.

it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Elimina il bersaglio e completa la missione.
  • Indossa solo il tuo abito.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Completa "Lutto in famiglia".
  • Elimina i bersagli con un fucile di precisione.
  • Elimina solo i bersagli.
  • Non essere individuato.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU:
• Completa "Lutto in famiglia".
  • Elimina solo il bersaglio.
  • Fai in modo che nessun corpo sia rinvenuto.
  • Non mettere tutto a repentaglio.
  • Se vieni inquadrato dalle telecamere, cancella o distruggi le registrazioni.
  • Indossa solo il tuo abito.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Completa "Lutto in famiglia".
  • Elimina solo il bersaglio.
  • Fai in modo che nessun corpo sia rinvenuto.
  • Non mettere tutto a repentaglio.
  • Se vieni inquadrato dalle telecamere, cancella o distruggi le registrazioni.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BIG4_DESC:
Completa tutte le sfide classiche di "Lutto in famiglia".
  • Assassino silenzioso
  • Assassino silenzioso, Solo abito
  • Assassino di precisione
  • Solo abito
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTO_COWORKER_DES: • Scatta una foto agli impiegati che flirtano.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FIND_TOKENS_DESC: • Ottieni entrambi i gettoni della banca Milton-Fitzpatrick.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PR: • Elimina Alexa Carlisle nella sua stanza privata.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PH: • Fulmina Alexa Carlisle durante il servizio fotografico.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ROOF_SNIPER_: Stai calmo e prendi la mira
• Elimina Alexa Carlisle con un fucile di precisione dal tetto della villa.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_UNDERTAKER_PRESENT: • Fai presentare al becchino la tomba di Alexa Carlisle.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTOGRAPHER_FAMIL: • Fai scattare al fotografo una foto della famiglia Carlisle.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FAMILY_GATHERING_D: • Scatta una foto ad Alexa Carlisle durante la riunione di famiglia.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_MURDE: Storia della missione - Mezzi, movente e occasione
• Completa la storia della missione "Mezzi, movente e occasione".
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_PHOTO: Storia della missione - Un giorno da ricordare
• Completa la storia della missione "Un giorno da ricordare".
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_BURIA: Storia della missione - Luogo dell'eterno riposo
• Completa la storia della missione "Luogo dell'eterno riposo".
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_RING_BELL_DESC: • Fai in modo che Alexa Carlisle si arrabbi per la campana.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MURDER_CLUES_DESC: • Trova tutti gli indizi in ogni luogo di interesse del caso di omicidio.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PATRICK_POOL_DESC: • Neutralizza Patrick Carlisle con una palla da biliardo.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_EDWARD_PIANO_DESC: • Neutralizza Edward Carlisle mentre suona il pianoforte.

de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Eliminieren Sie das Ziel und schließen Sie die Mission ab.
  • Erledigen Sie alles in Ihrem Anzug.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Schließen Sie „Todesfall in der Familie“ ab.
  • Eliminieren Sie die Ziele mit einem Scharfschützengewehr.
  • Eliminieren Sie nur die Ziele.
  • Bleiben Sie unbemerkt.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU:
• Schließen Sie „Todesfall in der Familie“ ab.
  • Eliminieren Sie nur das Ziel.
  • Keine Körper dürfen gefunden werden.
  • Bleiben Sie unbemerkt.
  • Werden Sie von Kameras gefilmt, löschen oder vernichten Sie die Beweise.
  • Erledigen Sie alles in Ihrem Anzug.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Schließen Sie „Todesfall in der Familie“ ab.
  • Eliminieren Sie nur das Ziel.
  • Keine Körper dürfen gefunden werden.
  • Bleiben Sie unbemerkt.
  • Werden Sie von Kameras gefilmt, löschen oder vernichten Sie die Beweise.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BIG4_DESC:
Schließen Sie alle Klassiker-Herausforderungen bei „Todesfall in der Familie“ ab:
  • Lautloser Killer
  • Lautloser Killer, Anzugpflicht
  • Sniper Assassin
  • Anzugpflicht
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTO_COWORKER_DES: • Machen Sie ein Foto von flirtenden Kollegen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PR: • Eliminieren Sie Alexa Carlisle in ihrem Privatzimmer.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_GR: • Schenken Sie Alexa Carlisle die ewige Ruhe.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PH: • Versetzen Sie Alexa Carlisle während des Fotoshootings einen Stromschlag.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_EM: Noch ein Todesfall in der Familie
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ROOF_SNIPER_: • Eliminieren Sie Alexa Carlisle mit einem Scharfschützengewehr vom Dach des Herrenhauses aus.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_UNDERTAKER_PRESENT: • Lassen Sie den Bestatter Alexa Carlisle das Grab präsentieren.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTOGRAPHER_FAMIL: • Lassen Sie den Fotografen ein Foto der Familie Carlisle machen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FAMILY_GATHERING_D: • Machen Sie während der Familienversammlung ein Foto von Alexa Carlisle.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_MURDE: • Schließen Sie die Story-Mission „Mittel, Motiv und Gelegenheit“ ab.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_PHOTO: • Schließen Sie die Story-Mission „Ein denkwürdiger Tag“ ab.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_BURIA: • Schließen Sie die Story-Mission „Ihre letzte Ruhestätte“ ab.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_RING_BELL_DESC: • Verärgern Sie Alexa Carlisle mit der Glocke.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MURDER_CLUES_DESC: • Finden Sie alle Hinweise an allen interessanten Orten beim rätselhaften Mordfall.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_GREGORY_NEWS_DESC: • Stellen Sie Gregory Carlisle mit einer Zeitung ruhig.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PATRICK_POOL_DESC: • Stellen Sie Patrick Carlisle mit einer Billardkugel ruhig.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_EDWARD_PIANO_DESC: • Stellen Sie Edward Carlisle ruhig, während er Klavier spielt.

es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Elimina al objetivo y completa la misión.
  • No te cambies de traje.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Completa «Muerte en la familia».
  • Elimina a los objetivos con un rifle de francotirador.
  • Elimina solo a los objetivos.
  • Evita que te descubran.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU:
• Completa «Muerte en la familia».
  • Elimina solo a los objetivos.
  • Que no descubran cuerpos.
  • No te veas comprometido.
  • Si te detectan las cámaras, borra o destruye las pruebas.
  • No te cambies de traje.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE:
• Completa «Muerte en la familia».
  • Elimina solo a los objetivos.
  • Que no descubran cuerpos.
  • No te veas comprometido.
  • Si te detectan las cámaras, borra o destruye las pruebas.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_BIG4_DESC:
Completa todos los desafíos clásicos de «Muerte en la familia».
  • Asesino silencioso
  • Asesino silencioso, solo con traje
  • Asesino francotirador
  • Solo con traje
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTO_COWORKER_DES: • Haz una foto de los empleados tonteando.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PR: • Elimina a Alexa Carlisle en su sala privada.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_GR: • Invita a Alexa Carlisle al descanso eterno.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ELIMINATE_PH: • Electrocuta a Alexa Carlisle durante la sesión fotográfica.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_ALEXA_ROOF_SNIPER_: • Elimina a Alexa Carlisle con un fusil de francotirador desde el tejado de la mansión.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_UNDERTAKER_PRESENT: • Consigue que el empleado de pompas fúnebres presente la tumba de Alexa Carlisle.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PHOTOGRAPHER_FAMIL: • Consigue que el fotógrafo haga la foto familiar de los Carlisle.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_FAMILY_GATHERING_D: • Hazle una foto a Alexa Carlisle durante la reunión familiar.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_MURDE: Historia de la misión: Motivo, modus operandi y oportunidad
• Completa la historia de la misión: «Motivo, modus operandi y oportunidad».
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_PHOTO: Historia de la misión: Un día inolvidable
• Completa la historia de la misión: «Un día inolvidable».
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MISSIONSTORY_BURIA: Historia de la misión: Descanso eterno
• Completa la historia de la misión: «Descanso eterno».
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_RING_BELL_DESC: • Consigue hacer enfadar a Alexa Carlisle con la campana.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_MURDER_CLUES_DESC: • Encuentra todas las pistas en todos los puntos de interés del misterio del asesinato.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_GREGORY_NEWS_DESC: • Deja inconsciente a Gregory Carlisle con un periódico.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_PATRICK_POOL_DESC: • Deja inconsciente a Patrick Carlisle con una bola de billar.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_BULLDOG_EDWARD_PIANO_DESC: • Deja inconsciente a Edward Carlisle mientras toca el piano.
